video.title: Tomorrow's Cantabile
video.synopsis: A gifted pianist at a prestigious music school has his meticulous world shaken up by a free-spirited piano prodigy, who both annoys and charms him.

episodes.synopsis: After having the worst day of his life, Yoo-jin binge-drinks and falls asleep in front of someone else's apartment. He wakes up in Nae-il's pigsty!
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Nae-il starts stalking Yoo-jin. Yoo-jin gets excited at the news that Maestro Stresemann is coming to his school, without realizing what is awaiting.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: As Yoo-jin makes repeated requests, Stresemann makes his life hard by dumping difficult missions on him. Nae-il gets harassed by an unknown person.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: After Yoo-jin loses his position, S-Orchestra's practice doesn't go well. Stresemann leaves the orchestra, and Nae-il worries about busy Min-hee.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: S-Orchestra feels intimated by A-Orchestra's rehearsal. Thanks to Yoo-jin, they perform their own unique way. Their future is now up to the judges.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Yoon-hoo saves drowning Yoo-jin, and their paths cross again. Yoo-jin finds doubling as Stresemann's student, assistant, and secretary, stressful.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Yoon-hoo shows up at school and taunts Yoo-jin. Which one will Yoo-jin choose? A performance with Stresemann or his friendship with S-Orchestra?
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Yoo-jin is inspired by Yoon-hoo's performance. He gets on stage, determined to make his best performance. Nae-il doesn't show up at the after-party.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Kang-jae's lesson causes a fight between Nae-il and Yoo-jin. Both regret but find it hard to make up. A new poster says S-Orchestra will be disbanded.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: With improved skills, S-Orchestra members get selected to join a new orchestra. This helps them and Nae-il realize that they were wrong about Yoo-jin.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: On the first day of performance, Nae-il fears getting on stage for rehearsal, and Yoon-hoo's hand pain doesn't subside with pain killers.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Yoo-jin has a plane & ship phobia due to trauma. Thinking that therapy will help him get to Europe, Nae-il decides to participate in a competition.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Nae-il passes the first round, but an unwelcoming face is waiting for her in the next round. Il-rak is chosen as the soloist of Rising Star.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Nae-il performs her best, but ends up interpreting the piece her own way. Yoo-jin struggles as his relationship with Rising Star members deteroiates.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Rising Star is about to be disbanded! Nae-il seems to be having a good time on a date with Yoo-jin whom she hypnotized, but she has another plan...
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Yoo-jin overcomes his trauma and goes to Jeju Island for Nae-il. They fly to Austria for Nae-il's competition, but she might not be able to perform!
episodes.title: Episode 16
